defs: = ಕಳಾಸ.
having no taste for art or aesthetics.
not embellished; having no grace; dull.
a man having no taste for art or aesthetics.
he who is not embellished or having no grace.
want of taste for art or aesthetics; lack of quality or qualities of imagination, artistic nature.
the dullness; absence of grace (as on one's face).
a woman having no taste for art or aesthetics.
she who is not embellished or having no grace.
to cease to exist; to die.
to pass - a) to go or move forward, through or out; b) to spend (one's time, days, life etc.).
to slip by; to elapse; to pass (as time).
to avoid happening; to fend off.
to drive out or away.
to go beyond (one's capacity, power, etc.); to become impossible.
to deduct; to subtract.
to grow or become ripe; to ripen well.
to advance in age; to become old.
to lose strength, vigor, etc. (as in advanced age).
to rejoice; to be delighted; to be pleased.
to have unwarranted pride and undue self-importance; to become arrogant.

a wooden pin used to insert a) in to the hole of latch of a door for preventing it from being opened or b) in to the hole of a yoke to hold the cord preventing from an ox disengaging itself from the yoke.
a thick liquid food made by boiling rice, ragi (finger millet) or jowar flour in water; a kind of porridge.
soft mud; slush; soggy earth; clay.
(dial.) the sap of some kinds of palm, fermented to produce arrack; toddy.
the quality of being aggressively assertive, presumptuous or overbearing; arrogance.
name of a region in the east India; the present Orissa state.
the fork-tailed shrike, Lanius forficutus.
the bird Cuculus melanoleucus.
the plant Wrightia zeylanica (= W. antidysentrica) tinctoria of Apocynceae family.
its seed.
a man who cheats others; a fraud; a cheat.
the black bird, Merula musica with a fine note.

any of a family (Laniidae) of predatory, shrill-voiced passerine birds with hooked beaks, gray, black, and white plumage, and long tails, most types of which feed on insects, some on small birds, frogs, etc., which they may impale on thorns before eating; a shrike.
a kind of medicinal substance.
the use of false representations to gain unjust advantage; the quality of being deceitful; fraud.
the tree Terminalia bellirica (=T. bellerica) of Combretaceae family.
the place of origin of river Yamunā, one of the major rivers of North India.
the sun.
= ಕಳಿಂದಜೆ.
Yamunā river, one of the major rivers of North India.
= ಕಳಿಂದಜೆ.
the grass Sorghum vulgare (= Andropogon sorghum) of Poaceae family.
its millet; great sorghum.
a kind of flowering plant.
the plant Maninot esculenta (=M. utilissima) of Euphorbiaceae family; cassava plant.
the root of this plant.
a small swelling or projection on a plant, from which a flower develops; a flower-bud.
small flame at the end of a burning wick of a lamp.
a fruit in its very early stage.
a young leaf or bunch of young leaves.
a particular kind of prose.
the state of being exhausted; the condition of being used up; complete consumption.
a small quantity of liquid that is somewhat spherical, as when falling; a drop.
a wooden pin used to insert in to the hole of a yoke to hold the cord preventing from an ox disengaging itself from the yoke.
any of the small staffs or rods fixed on side beams on either sides of a bullock cart, to which a frame of bamboos is fixed.
a weapon, usu. consisting of a long blade fixed in a hilt with a guard for the hand, used for cutting or thrusting; a sword.
to speak arrogantly; to talk agressively asserting oneself.
a yoke provided with a wooden pin that prevents an ox from disengaging itself from the yoke.
to send (a person) off or away; to send to; to despatch (a person or goods).
to spend (one's time, days, life etc.).
to pass over; to go from one side to the other of; to go across.
a small tree Commiphora caudata (= Balsamodendron caudatum) of Burseraceae family; hill mango tree.
(dial.) that is essential or important; absolutely necessary; indispensable.
a superior quality, boiled areca nut.
he who never dies; a deity.
= ಕಳಿಲೆ.
the shoot of a bamboo.
a tender, not fully grown, bamboo.
= ಕಳಿಲೆಬಿದಿರು.
= ಕಳಿಲೆಬಿದಿರು.
(a young shoot) to be put forth.
(enthusiasm, zeal, etc.) to emanate from within.

a fruit fully grown or developed; esp. ready to be harvested and used for food.
a fruit that is overripe, nearing decaying.
the state of being sunk down, bent down; loss of vitality or strength.
the state of being well grown; ripe condition or age.
to become excessive; to be in abundant quantity, number.
to cross over; to go to the other end or side.
the end of one's existence; death; cessasion.
the state of being defeated; a defeat.
a small (temporary) platform raised on poles (as in agricultural fields, for watching the crop).
that which is or has become, unproductive (as a cow).
to cause or induce another to steal; to help a thief in thieving.
to send - a) to cause to go or be carried; to dispatch, convey or transmit; b) to dispatch, convey or transmit (a letter, message, etc.) by mail.
to arrange for the going of; to enable to go.

to commit or get by, theft; to take or appropriate (another's property, ideas, etc.) without permission, dishonestly or unlawfully, esp. in a secret or surreptitious manner; to steal; to thieve.
a quantity of thread or yarn wound in a coil; a skein.
(dial.) a shallow place in a stream, river, etc., where one can cross by wading or by riding on horseback, in an automobile, etc.
the act of being damaged, injured or spoiled; an instance of (a thing) becoming useless.
a sound imitating that of a stick breaking; crackling sound.
to utter a shrill screeching sound or words, esp. in pain or terror; to shriek.
to drink toddy or alcoholic drinks.
one who drinks toddy or any alcoholic drink.
the act or an instance of cheating; fraud; deception.
to send (a person) off or away; to send to; to despatch (a person or goods).
to spend (one's time, days, life etc.).
to pass over; to go from one side to the other of; to go across.
the creeper Cucscuta reflexa of Convolvulaceae family; sky creeper.
any undesired, uncultivated plant, esp. one growing in profusion so as to crowd out a desired crop, disfigure a lawn, etc.; a weed.

an oblation offered to manes.
a dinner hosted for the relatives before sending them off at the close of a marriage.
the act of sending, despatching.
ಕಳುಹಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ kaḷuhisikoḷ to be sent off.

= ಕಳುವೂಟ.
to give up; to abandon; to forsake; to leave.
to move (something) from where it is; to transfer or carry away or from one place to another; to remove.
to be removed; to be sent off.
to push out; to throw away.
to take of (an ornament, clothe, etc. worn on the body).
to remove by rubbing; to obliterate.
to destroy; to kill.
to make less hard to bear; lighten or relieve (pain, suffering, tiredness, etc.).
to cease to exist; to die.
to pass - a) to go or move forward, through or out; b) to spend (one's time, days, life etc.).
to slip by; to elapse; to pass (as time).
to avoid happening; to fend off.
to drive out or away.
to go beyond (one's capacity, power, etc.); to become impossible.
to deduct; to subtract.
any undesired, uncultivated plant, esp. one growing in profusion so as to crowd out a desired crop, disfigure a lawn, etc.; a weed.
(fig.) anything worthless, useless.
the pain caused by muscular contractions of a woman at the time of giving birth to a child; labour pain.
a slender hollow bamboo, with holes along its length, used as a musical instrument; a musical bamboo-pipe.
a small part of a whole.
the smallest particle which is indivisible further.
the apparent incremental portion of the moon over previous day during its waxing period.
a measure of time equal to eight seconds.
any of the fine arts, as poetry, music, sculpture, painting, etc.
a human offspring in the first eight weeks from conception; the embryo.
expertness, practised ability, facility in an action; dexterity.
gloss, brilliance or sheen; lustre.
a small vessel propelled on water by an engine, oars or sails; a boat.
blood and other materials discharged from the lining of the uterus in sexually mature non-pregnant women at intervals of about one lunar month until the menopause.
a single basic unit of rhythm in poetry.
(phil.) the principle of the physical existence of the soul (which are sixteen in numbers).
the thick, whitish fluid secreted by the male reproductive organs and containing the spermatozoa; the semen.
(dial.) a folk dancer who visits houses during the fourth month in Tuḷu calendar (corresponding to July-August period).
a kind of nut-tree; .

to clear (an area) of weeds; to weed out.
to remove unwanted, worthless or useless parts, things, components, etc. from.
to add charm, beauty to; to add grace; to embellish.
to become beautiful, attractive.
to add charm, beauty to; to add grace.
to become pale; to lose lustre.

to become pale; to lose lustre.

to spread out lustre around; to exhibit one's beauty vividly.

to beautify, to adorn; to embellish.
to add interest to a narrative with attractive commentaries, notes, etc.
Śiva, who has the crescent moon in his crest.
the act or process of taking off, subtracting from.
a depriving or being deprived; deprivation.
to become beautiful, attractive; to become graceful.
to add charm, beauty to; to add grace.

to show a sign, mark etc.
to shine; to glitter; to be brilliant.
any chemical substance used to destroy weeds or to check their growth; a weedicide; a herbicide.

collectively unwanted plants growing in profusion crowding out a desired crop; weeds.
to push out; to drive out or away.

the moon.

immediately; all of a sudden; unexpectedly; suddenly.

to become black; to grow darke or darker.
to drink toddy.

partial or total absence of light.
lack of spiritual or intellectual knowledge.
a weapon for cutting and thrusting, consisting of a hilt with a cross-guard and a long straight or curved blade with a sharp point; a sword.
the four-legged long-eared mammal of the horse genus Equus hemionus; an ass.
(in gen.) the domesticated one; a donkey.
any of various wolflike carnivores (family Hyaenidae), with powerful jaws, a bristly mane, short hind legs, and a characteristic shrill cry, fed on carrion; a hyena.

to make; to arrange; to fashion; to form.

the taste or flavour of toddy.

ಕಳ್ಳಕಾಕರು kaḷḷa kākākaru (pl.) thieves and wicked people; ಕಳ್ಳ ಕಳ್ಳಗೆ ನೆಂಟು,ಹುಳಿ ಮೆಣಸಿಗೆ ನೆಂಟು kaḷḷa kaḷḷage neṇṭu, huḷi meṇasige neṇṭu birds of same feather flock together; ಕಳ್ಳ ಪೂಜಾರಿಗೆ ಮೈಯೆಲ್ಲಾ ನಾಮ kaḷḷa pūjārige maiyellā nāma a make-believe wolf comes always in sheep's clothing; ಕಳ್ಳನ ಮನಸ್ಸು ಹುಳ್ಳಗೆ kaḷḷana manassu huḷḷage hewho commits a fault, thinks everyone speaks of it; ಕಳ್ಳನ ಹೆಂಡತಿ ಎಂದಿದ್ದರೂ ಮುಂಡೆ kaḷḷana heṇḍati endiddarū muṇḍe it is certain, the guilty will get his deserved punishment; no crime can remain undetected; ಕಳ್ಳನ ಹೆಜ್ಜೆ ಕಳ್ಳನೆ ಬಲ್ಲ kaḷḷana hejje klaḷḷane balla a thief knows the knavery of another thief; a thief knows a thief, as a wolf knows a wolf; ಕಳ್ಳನಿಗೆ ಸಂದುಕೊಟ್ಟು, ಒಡವೆಗೆ ಹುಯ್ಯಲಿಡು kaḷḷanige sandukoṭṭu, oḍavege huyyaliḍu host a thief, later cry over what is thieved; ಕಳ್ಳನಿಗೊಂದು ಪಿಳ್ಳೆ ನೆವ kaḷḷanigondu piḷḷe neva when not inclined to do something, a petty execuse is a sufficient reason; ತಾನು ಕಳ್ಳ ಪರರನ್ನು ನಂಬ tānu kaḷḷa, pararannu namba a thief thinks every other man steals; a cheat, doubts every one; ಕಳ್ಳರು ಕಳ್ಳರು ಸಂತೆ ಕೂಡಿದಹಾಗೆ kaḷḷaru kaḷḷaru sante kūḍida hāge it is an association of cheats who together cheat outsiders, besides cheating among themselves; ಕಳ್ಳ ಹೊಕ್ಕಮನೆಗೆ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ದಂಡ kaḷḷa hokka manege eṇṇe daṇḍa a mere formal investigation of a theft is a futile exercise (if things thieved cannot be recovered).
a fradulent, deceitful transaction.

the skin of the jack-fruit seed.

skill in using one's hands or body; adroitness; dexterity.

a letter, paper, document, etc. that is not genuine; a forged paper or letter.
